title: Noncompliance with procedural rules
context: [ยง124A-133] Noncompliance with procedural rules. Any person subject to this chapter who: (1) Is responsible for unnecessary delay in the disposition of any case of a person accused of an offense under this chapter; or (2) Knowingly and intentionally fails to enforce or comply with any provision of this chapter regulating the proceedings before, during, or after trial of an accused; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2]
